Room.Name: Top of a Brick Cistern
Room.ShortDescription: You are atop a circular brick cistern and can hear water splashing below.
Room.LongDescription: Looking down you see a narrow ledge which winds around the circular well, giving access to the dark waters below. There doesn't seem to be any handrails, and the sides are quite slippery with moss. A pebble dropped over the side takes a long time to splash in the water below.
